about_the_game:
What Does It Mean to Feel Human?

Infinite Nowhere is a sci-fi narrative adventure about discovering humanity through the eyes of an android, across the vast cosmos and into the depths of the human soul.

STRUGGLING AGAINST INFINITY

  • Repair oxygen leaks, restore failing power systems, and reestablish communication as the ship (Your Home)  lingers on the edge of disaster.

  • Every failure pushes the crew closer to collapse, as the anomaly destabilizes reality itself.

A STORY-DRIVEN JOURNEY OF HUMANITY THROUGH THE EYES OF AN ANDRIOD

  • Experience a deeply emotional journey as you form fragile bonds with the crew through intimate, tension-filled conversations. As their emotions unravel and reality fractures, your success in this mission becomes humanity’s final hope.

  • Piece together their stories through logs, artifacts, and environmental clues that reveal the crew’s collapse and humanity’s fragile place in the universe.

COSMIC WONDERS AND EXISTENTIAL QUESTIONS

  • Explore awe-inspiring cosmic phenomena that defy the laws of physics. Confront mysteries that challenge your identity, distort reality, and question existence itself.

  • Immerse yourself in an atmosphere of beauty and terror, where every discovery raises more questions than answers.

INTO THE DEPTHS OF THE UNKNOWN

  • Deploy a drone to explore uncharted regions of space, investigate celestial phenomena, and uncover secrets hidden in the vast, unreachable corners of the universe.

A PERSONAL JOURNEY

Crafted by solo developer Savas Ege, Infinite Nowhere is a heartfelt exploration of humanity, emotion, and the fragile line between connection and isolation in the vastness of space.

TAKE THE LEAP

Are you ready to uncover the ultimate question: What does it mean to be human?

Add Infinite Nowhere to your wishlist today and don’t miss this unforgettable journey.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Uncover humanity through the eyes of an android, aboard a spaceship on an unforgiving journey across the universe. Maintain failing systems, forge fragile bonds with the crew, explore breathtaking cosmic wonders, and confront profound mysteries of life, identity, and our place in the cosmos.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
